t.t-value: task.get('user_id', ['', ''])[1] if isinstance(task.get('user_id'), tuple) else task.get('user_id', '')

t.t-if: task.get('effective_date_terminated') and (task.get('data_model') not in freq_models or task.get('data_model') in freq_models and task.get('state') != 'cancelled')
task.get('effective_date_terminated')==False or (task.get('data_model') in freq_models and task.get('effective_date_terminated') and task.get('state') == 'cancelled')
